properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ?

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, LOCATION_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT, COUNT(BOARD_REPLY_NO) AS "LIKE_COUNT" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN LOCATION USING(LOCATION_CODE) LEFT JOIN "LIKE" ON(BOARD_REPLY_NO = BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, LOCATION_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), READ_COUNT ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_NM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DT, READ_COUNT, B.MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_CT_NO, CONTENT, CONTENT_SIZE, CONTENT_LEVEL FROM BOARD_ARTICLE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NO, IMG_SIZE, IMG_RENAME, IMG_ORIGINAL, IMG_LEVEL FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(?, ?, ?, sysdate, sysdate, 10, 'N', ?, ?, ?)
SELECT LOCATION_CODE FROM LOCATION WHERE LOCATION_NM = ?
SELECT HASHTAG_NO FROM HASHTAG_LIST WHERE HASHTAG_NM = ?
SELECT HASHTAG_NM FROM HASHTAG_LIST JOIN BOARD(USING HASHTAG_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
